definition: gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: Then I released the shutter and set the firefly free.
sentences.chinese: 然後我關掉快門，把螢火蟲放走了。

sentences.english: Digital cameras, for example, play a digitized version of an analog shutter.
sentences.chinese: 例如數碼相機就會播放模擬相機的快門的聲音。

sentences.english: There's also a power button, shutter release, and zoom slider up top -- all pretty standard stuff.
sentences.chinese: 頂部上有一個電源按鍵，快門按鍵，鏡頭遠近調焦鍵。

sentences.english: Then the guide flung sand into the air, and I clicked the shutter.
sentences.chinese: 然後導遊剷起沙子揚到空氣中，我快速按下快門。

sentences.english: Use the fastest shutter speed possible.
sentences.chinese: 儘可能用最高的快門速度。

sentences.english: Then, you will move your film forward and wait for the next shot.
sentences.chinese: 然後，向前轉動膠片等待按動下一次快門。

sentences.english: A "camera shutter" sound is played whenever a screenshot is captured during recording.
sentences.chinese: 錄製過程中，抓圖時會播放相機快門聲。

sentences.english: He racked his camera and pressed down the shutter release.
sentences.chinese: 他將照相機的焦距調好，然後按下快門。

sentences.english: The 10-second timer is activated when the shutter button is pressed.
sentences.chinese: 當快門按鈕按下時，10秒計時起被啓動。

sentences.english: The shutter is fail safe and gravity fed.
sentences.chinese: 快門故障安全和重力餵養。

sentences.english: Always light source, with the shutter devices.
sentences.chinese: 常亮型光源，帶快門裝置。

sentences.english: Hold the camera steadily when pressing the shutter.
Adjust the shutter speed and aperture.
You will want to use a type of remote shutter release to avoid touching the camera.
sentences.chinese: 爲避免碰到相機，你可以使用遙控快門線來控制快門。

sentences.english: You will want to use a type of remote shutter release to avoid touching the camera.
sentences.chinese: 爲避免碰到相機，你可以使用遙控快門線來控制快門。

sentences.english: Conversely, you might use a slow shutter speed to compensate for low light conditions—the longer the hole is open, the more light gets in, right?
sentences.chinese: 反過來說，你可以用慢速快門來補償暗光條件。

definition: camera lens/camera shot (in a movie etc)/scene
body of a vehicle or machine/fuselage of a plane
(technical) manual/(book of) directions/synopsis (of a play or film)/specification (patent)/CL:本[ben3]
film/roll of film/also written 膠捲|胶卷
